content: the tissue box cover in the picture is crocheted with schachenmayr nomotta bravo in 6 colors 4mm crochet hook it´s made for a box 12x12 5 cm but you can easily adjust the size by working less row or adding more i will tell you in the pattern where you have to do that it s up to you how many colors you will use for this project i bet even in 1 color only it will look nice o happy hooking everyone o
